name: Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Simulator
name_original: Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Simulator
description:
Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Sim provides you a chance to start a tuk tuk auto rickshaw ride and save all passengers from the wild animals like dinosaurs. The rickshaw driving game providesoffers you a pick n drop service to the people who are enjoying their vacations in the hilly areas. The rickshaw driving stimulator game gives you a chance to enjoy driving in the mountain city with unexpected wildlife traffic namely dinosaurs.

Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Sim gives you a real fun by picking the passengers, dropping them at their desired destination and saving them from the dinosaurs. Don't mess with the dinosaurs, just drive around themfor safety reason. If disturbed, they will chase and kill dead. The passengers will be waiting for you at the rickshaw stop; you should pick them from there and drop them. Take a rickshaw traffic challenge and provide the best services to the passengers. The rickshaw game will test your skills of acceleration, steering, driving and parking. Enjoy tuk tuk rickshaw drifting and drive as fast as you like, but drive carefully to avoid hitting wilder life or road sides. Complete the mission of rickshaw race by completing all the levels smartly.

Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Sim helps you to drive on the dangerous roads and dodge the wandering dinosaurs. This passenger game gives you challenging tasks to drive efficiently on the hill…. roads. Drop the passengers within a limited time period. Download this amazing tuk tuk game and enjoy in your spare time.

Features of Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Sim

  • Adventurous and thrilling driving experience
  • Drive through dangerous turns
  • Save the passengers from the dinosaurs
  • Amazing environment with hills and mountains
  • Multiple camera mode to enhance gameplay

Feature Graphics

Off Road Tuk Tuk Adventure Sim gives you the realistic drive to enjoy on the mountains and hilly areas. The chingchi rickshaw tuk tuk sim let. you to drive and give a pick n drop service to the passengers steering through native wild life that sometimes may wander on the roads. Save all the passengers from the dangerous hilly turns and dinosaurs.
